Detailed Description

Definition at line 12 of file rgrl_trans_quadratic.h.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

rgrl_trans_quadratic::rgrl_trans_quadratic ( unsigned int  dimension = 0)

Initialize to the identity transformation.

Definition at line 13 of file rgrl_trans_quadratic.cxx.

rgrl_trans_quadratic::rgrl_trans_quadratic ( vnl_matrix< double > const &  Q,
vnl_matrix< double > const &  A,
vnl_vector< double > const &  trans,
vnl_matrix< double > const &  covar 
)

Construct quadratic standard transform.

The transform is q = Q * hot(p) + A * p + trans, where hot(p)= [px^2 py^2 pxpy]^t in 2D, and hot(p)= [px^2 py^2 pz^2 pxpy pypz pxpz]^t in 3D. See covar() for the ordering of the covariance matrix.

Definition at line 22 of file rgrl_trans_quadratic.cxx.

rgrl_trans_quadratic::rgrl_trans_quadratic ( vnl_matrix< double > const &  Q,
vnl_matrix< double > const &  A,
vnl_vector< double > const &  trans 
)

Construct quadratic standard transform.

The transform is q = Q * hot(p) + A * p + trans, where hot(p)= [px^2 py^2 pxpy]^t in 2D, and hot(p)= [px^2 py^2 pz^2 pxpy pypz pxpz]^t in 3D. See covar() for the ordering of the covariance matrix.

The covariance matrix is a zero matrix.

Definition at line 42 of file rgrl_trans_quadratic.cxx.

rgrl_trans_quadratic::rgrl_trans_quadratic ( vnl_matrix< double > const &  Q,
vnl_matrix< double > const &  A,
vnl_vector< double > const &  trans,
vnl_matrix< double > const &  covar,
vnl_vector< double > const &  from_centre,
vnl_vector< double > const &  to_centre 
)

Construct a centered quadratic transform.

The transform is q = Q * hot( p - from_center) + A * ( p - from_centre ) + trans + to_centre.

See covar() for the ordering of the covariance matrix.

Definition at line 57 of file rgrl_trans_quadratic.cxx.

Definition at line 186 of file rgrl_trans_quadratic.cxx.

unsigned int rgrl_object::add_observer ( rgrl_event_sptr  event,
rgrl_command_sptr  cmd 
) [inherited]

Allow people to add/remove/invoke observers (callbacks) to any rgrl object.

This is an implementation of the subject/observer design pattern. An observer is added by specifying an event to respond to and an rgrl_command to execute. It returns an unsigned long tag which can be used later to remove the event or retrieve the command.

Definition at line 61 of file rgrl_transformation.cxx.

vnl_matrix< double > const & rgrl_trans_quadratic::Q ( ) const

Provide the covariance matrix of the estimate (scale is factored in).

The rows of the [ Q_ A_] matrix are of the form a_i^T containing the coefficients of [x^2 y^2 z^2 xy yz xz x y z]. The assumed form of the covar matrix is for a vector ( a_1^T, trans[0], ... , a_n^T, trans[n] )^T

defined in base class vnl_matrix<double> covar() const; The 2nd-order component of the quadratic transform.

Definition at line 194 of file rgrl_trans_quadratic.cxx.

vnl_matrix< double > rgrl_trans_quadratic::transfer_error_covar ( vnl_vector< double > const &  p) const [virtual]

Compute covariance of the transfer error based on transformation covariance.

This gives the additional uncertainty of the transferred point location due to the uncertainty of the transform estimate.

Implements rgrl_transformation.
